title: Seriof Title Font ID please
content:
Howdy —

Help ID-ing the attached font plz.  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [title08.17.09.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090820030545/http:/typophile.com/files/title08.17.09.jpg) | 52.38 KB |
author: Nakamova

comments.content:
Argh! I’m not sure of the face, but the art is full of type crimes! Fake small caps, interior stroke... Gross.

Otherwise, good luck.
I know! It needs tons of help. I may just pick the closest font with real smallcaps...
Looks like [Monotype Garamond Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20090820030545/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/garamond/mt-bold/characters.html) ( the P is most telling ).
